perturbation.original_text:
WHEREAS, Integra desires to engage PcoMed to apply certain of its surface technologies onto Integra's implantable spinal medical devices for preclinical, clinical and commercial use and distribution by Integra; and

WHEREAS, PcoMed is willing to apply such surface technologies onto Integra's implantable spinal medical devices and to grant Integra certain exclusive rights to use and commercialize those devices; and

NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the mutual covenants and promises herein contained, the parties hereto agree as follows: 1. DEFINITIONS.

As used in this Agreement, the following initially capitalized terms, whether used in the singular or plural form, shall have the meanings set forth in this Section 1.
perturbation.changed_text:
WHEREAS, Integra desires to engage PcoMed to apply certain of its surface technologies onto Integra's implantable spinal medical devices for preclinical, clinical and commercial use and distribution by Integra; and

WHEREAS, PcoMed is willing to apply such surface technologies onto Integra's implantable spinal medical devices and to grant Integra certain exclusive rights to use and commercialize those devices; and

NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the mutual covenants and promises herein contained, the parties hereto agree as follows: 1. DEFINITIONS.

As used in this Agreement, the following initially capitalized terms, whether used in the singular or plural form, shall have the meanings set forth in this Section 1, with the exception of the term 'Agreement' which shall be interpreted according to common business usage and not limited to this specific document.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Agreement' is a key defined term. By stating that it will be interpreted according to 'common business usage' instead of the defined term introduces ambiguity and creates contradiction on how the contract should be interpreted. There is uncertainty on whether or not the definition of 'Agreement' is valid.

perturbation.original_text:
1.29. "Treated Integra Product" means an Integra Product that utilizes or embodies, in whole or part, the PcoMed Surface Modification Technology, excluding Partially Treated Integra Product.

1.30. "US Marketing Clearance" means Regulatory Approval of a Treated Integra Product or Partially Treated Integra Product for use in the Field in the United States. 2. CONSIDERATION.
perturbation.changed_text:
1.29. "Treated Integra Product" means an Integra Product that utilizes or embodies, in whole or part, the PcoMed Surface Modification Technology, excluding Partially Treated Integra Product, unless specified otherwise.

1.30. "US Marketing Clearance" means Regulatory Approval of a Treated Integra Product or Partially Treated Integra Product for use in the Field in the United States. 2. CONSIDERATION.
perturbation.explanation: By adding "unless specified otherwise" to the definition of “Treated Integra Product” introduces an internal contradiction as it allows the term to deviate from its defined meaning in unspecified circumstances. This creates uncertainty in its enforcement and allows for subjective interpretation.

perturbation.original_text:
3.  GRANT OF EXCLUSIVITY COMMERCIALIZATION

3.1. Grant of Exclusive Rights. Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, PcoMed hereby grants to Integra and its Affiliates a sole and exclusive worldwide right to sell and commercialize Integra Products treated by PcoMed, with the PcoMed Surface Modification Technology (the "Right") for use in the Field in the Territory, including the right to conduct research and development in support of any of the foregoing. Nothing herein grants any rights to Integra (i) to manufacture any products using the PcoMed Surface Modification Technology or (ii) to sell or commercialize any products utilizing the PcoMed Surface Modification Technology other than the Integra Products for use in the Field in the Territory.
perturbation.changed_text:
3.  GRANT OF EXCLUSIVITY COMMERCIALIZATION

3.1. Grant of Exclusive Rights. Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, PcoMed hereby grants to Integra and its Affiliates a sole and exclusive worldwide right to sell and commercialize Integra Products treated by PcoMed, with the PcoMed Surface Modification Technology (the "Right"), with the understanding that such rights can be reduced or altered based on PcoMed's discretion, for use in the Field in the Territory, including the right to conduct research and development in support of any of the foregoing. Nothing herein grants any rights to Integra (i) to manufacture any products using the PcoMed Surface Modification Technology or (ii) to sell or commercialize any products utilizing the PcoMed Surface Modification Technology other than the Integra Products for use in the Field in the Territory.
perturbation.explanation: The change introduces a contradiction by adding "with the understanding that such rights can be reduced or altered based on PcoMed's discretion" to the grant of exclusive rights. This directly conflicts with the 'sole and exclusive worldwide right' previously stated, undermining the agreement's enforceability. It creates uncertainty about Integra's rights and PcoMed's obligations.
